m0bilesecurity/RMS-Runtime-Mobile-Security

Manipulates Android and iOS apps at runtime via a web interface

View on index · View in 3D Map

Related repos

  • Static analysis for Android apps based on the OWASP MASVS framework
  • Curated list of mobile security resources
  • Android app for wireless and hardware security testing, inspired by Flipper Zero
  • Security research platform for mobile applications
  • detects web application firewalls and identifies their vendors
  • Roadmap and resources for Android security
  • Scans for trackers on Android devices
  • Converts websites into desktop and mobile applications
  • AI agent that taps and types on your iPhone across apps
  • Hardware monitoring dashboard for mobile devices
